name: 3D PACMAN (itch)
description:
PACMAN in 3-D!

Collect all the pellets and pick-ups while avoiding enemies to win and set a high score! Can you score over 10,000 pts?

3 pick-ups:

Cherries - 500 pts

Orange - 1000 pts

Speed Boost - 100 pts & speed increased

Controls:

Mouse - Look around

WASD - Movement

Shift - Sprint

Space - Roll

C - Crouch

Esc or P - Pause Game

Unreal Engine Marketplace Assets Used:

Infinity Blade: Effects

Infinity Blade: Grass Lands

Industry Props Pack 6

Modular Building Set

Assets also used from Udemy course: Unreal Engine: Create an Arcade Classic!

Unreal Engine: Create an Arcade Classic!

(Prototype game/demo)
